pr_title: Change the output type of FHIR Search from String to JsonArray

timeline.message: Change FHIR Search DoFn's output type from String to JsonArray

timeline.bodyText: I recommend you set the coder from inside your expand function in FhirIO.java - that way your users will not need to set their coders manually every time.
timeline.author: pabloem

timeline.message: SetCoder in implemenetation instead of test
